parsed.title: O mito de um menino morto que virou arma de ódio
parsed.summary: Um breve mergulho na história de como a morte de uma criança na Trento medieval foi transformada em símbolo de propaganda antissemita, perpetuada por impressões de madeira e, séculos depois, por memes digitais. O roteiro revela o mecanismo de fabricação do mito sem fechar o ciclo, deixando o espectador com a pergunta: como um horror se tornou brincadeira?

scenes.narration: Uma criança morta, um mito criado. Como um garoto virou símbolo de ódio?
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, cracked stone floor illuminated by a single flickering candle, weathered wooden figurine of a child with hollow eyes placed on the floor, low-key shadows stretching across the walls, composition focused on the eerie stillness of the object.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the figurine, candle flame gently swaying, dust particles drifting through the narrow light beam.
scenes.audioDescription: Low hum of distant church bells with subtle reverberation, faint echo in the stone chamber.

scenes.narration: Impressões de madeira surgiram, espalhando o rosto do menino sem explicação, invadindo cidades.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, cramped 15th‑century printing workshop, wooden press pressing a woodcut onto parchment, the child's face appearing starkly on each sheet, shafts of cold light from a high window highlighting the inked image, composition centered on the press and the emerging prints.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan across the printing press, ink spreading across the paper, subtle tilt upward to reveal the child's face on the sheet.
scenes.audioDescription: Soft clatter of the wooden press, rustle of parchment, muted ambient wind through the workshop window.

scenes.narration: Hoje, o mesmo selo brilha em memes, como se o horror fosse brincadeira infantil.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, modern smartphone held in a dim room, screen displaying a viral meme featuring the child's wooden face, neon glow from the device contrasting with the surrounding darkness, composition focused on the glowing screen and the distorted smile of the figure.
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle zoom in on the smartphone screen, notification badge briefly flashing, faint pulse of light across the face.
scenes.audioDescription: Soft digital notification ping, low ambient drone humming beneath the sound.

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, simple black screen with the white text "The Gap Files." centered, faint vignette edges, no additional elements.
scenes.motionDescription: Static shot with a very subtle breathing motion, like a faint pulse of darkness across the frame.

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
